mdRecord.dcterms:description: Describes Battle of the Wilderness; reports Confederate victory; predicts more fighting. Reports heavy losses, and own minor wound. Mentions his brother, Elihu H. Barclay.
The original of this letter is not extant. There are two files available: a PDF transcription and a plain text transcription.
